author: dblevins
msg: Further simplification of bean create code.
javax.ejb.SessionBean.setSessionContext is now processed as if it was @Resource public void setSessionContext, so now we don't have to treat this specially when creating bean instances.
Slightly refactored SessionSynchronization processesing which is basically the same concept of processing a legacy interface as if it was annotated.  Lot's more like this that we could do.

author: kevan
msg: Merge of 956768: Stub for a testcase for the JMX Monitoring. OPENEJB-1303: JMX API Tests OPENEJB-1272 OPENEJB-1275
